channel.title: ENA04 - Yhteiskunta & vaikuttaminen on PJMM - Englannin materiaalia
channel.description: Recent content in ENA04 - Yhteiskunta & vaikuttaminen on PJMM - Englannin materiaalia

item.title: Lauseenvastikkeet: Kirjoita
item.description: Muuta lauseenvastikkeiksi. 1. Johnny does not play football   (vaikka) his brother plays in the Premier League. 2. Jonathan takes cycling lessons    (kun taas) his sister is into show dance. 3. Timothy started studying for his exams   (sen j채lkeen kuin) he had taken his sister to school. 4. Jillian studies in the library   (aina kun) she can. 5. She often studies very noisily,   (ik채채n kuin) she owns the place.

item.title: Lauseenvastikkeet: Kirjoita
item.description: Muuta lauseenvastikkeiksi. 1. I absolutely loved the movie   (kaiken kaikkiaan), we had a lovely time. 2. Jonathan lost his ticket    (sen seurauksena) he had to buy a new one. 3. The screening had been sold out,    (kuitenkin), we managed to get him a seat as someone decided not to show up. 4. Jonathan had left his credit card at home   (sen lis채ksi), he did not have any cash with him either.
